msbt.message: Oh, ! It's been a while, hasn't it?Well, just so you know, I'm still the same old .The fame hasn't gone to my head. Yet. Ha HA!

Oh, it really is you! For a second there, I didn't even recognize you. It's been that long! You know, I was just thinking about you the other day. Wondering what you were getting up to. I'm just glad to see you're still here on . And I'm hyped to see what you do next!
Well, if it isn't ! It's been a while since we've crossed paths. I was starting to wonder if you were under some kind of nondisclosure agreementlike, about your life!
Buongiorno, ! I've been brushing up on my Spanish since we last met up.

At last, it's ! What did I do while you were gone? Let's see I mostly watched kung fu movies in my basement. And then made kung fu movies in my basement. And then waited for my arms to heal.<10_4 /> Did you know that no one can hear me scream from my basement? Anyway, welcome back!
You seem somehow different since the last time we met. New outfit? New hairstyle? Spill the deets!
You seem somehow different since the last time we met. New outfit? New hairstyle? Spill the deets!
